text: A song of ascents.\f + \fr Ps 126 \ft The Hebrew Bible counts the superscription as the first verse of the psalm \f*
When Yahweh restored the fortunes\f + \fr 126:1 \ft Or “captivity” \f* of Zion,\f + \fr 126:1 \ft Or “\fq those \ft returned of \fq belonging to \ft Zion” \f*
Then our mouth was filled with laughter,
Then they said among the nations,
“Yahweh has done great \add things\add* for these \add people\add*.”
Yahweh has done great \add things\add* for us;
Restore, O Yahweh, our fortunes\f + \fr 126:4 \ft Or “captivity” \f*
like the streams in the Negeb.\f + \fr 126:4 \ft Or “South” \f*
He who diligently goes \add out\add* with weeping,
shall certainly come \add in\add* with rejoicing,
